sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import {
  Container,
  Typography,
  Grid,
  Card,
  CardContent,
  Box,
  Button,
  Chip,
  Paper,
  Avatar,
  Divider,
  List,
  ListItem,
  ListItemIcon,
  ListItemText,
  Fade,
  Slide,
  Zoom,
  IconButton,
  Tooltip,
} from '@mui/material';
import {
  Security,
  CloudUpload,
  Scanner,
  Shield,
  Analytics,
  Speed,
  AutoFixHigh,
  Assessment,
  Visibility,
  BugReport,
  CheckCircle,
  ArrowForward,
  PlayArrow,
  Download,
  Terminal,
  Settings,
  Code,
  Build,
  ContentCopy,
  GitHub,
  Storage,
  CloudDownload,
} from '@mui/icons-material';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';

const Dashboard: React.FC = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false);
  const [copiedCommand, setCopiedCommand] = useState('');

  useEffect(() => {
    setVisible(true);
  }, []);

  const copyToClipboard = (text: string, command: string) => {
    navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);
    setCopiedCommand(command);
    setTimeout(() => setCopiedCommand(''), 2000);
  };

  const features = [
    {
      title: 'AI-Powered Log Analysis',
      description: 'Advanced ML algorithms detect anomalies in real-time across all AWS log types',
      icon: <Analytics sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: '#8B4513' }} />,
      action: () => navigate('/logs'),
      actionText: 'Analyze Logs',
      highlights: ['5 AWS Log Types', 'Real-time Detection', 'ML Anomaly Engine'],
      delay: 200
    },
    {
      title: 'Infrastructure Security Scanner',
      description: '150+ security rules scan Terraform code for misconfigurations and vulnerabilities',
      icon: <Scanner sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: '#A0522D' }} />,
      action: () => navigate('/scanner'),
      actionText: 'Scan Infrastructure',
      highlights: ['150+ Security Rules', 'Terraform Support', 'Instant Results'],
      delay: 400
    },
    {
      title: 'Intelligent Rule Management',
      description: 'ML automatically generates security rules and learns from your approval patterns',
      icon: <AutoFixHigh sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: '#CD853F' }} />,
      action: () => navigate('/rules'),
      actionText: 'Manage Rules',
      highlights: ['Auto-Generated Rules', 'Human-in-Loop', 'Continuous Learning'],
      delay: 600
    }
  ];

  const stats = [
    { label: 'AWS Services Covered', value: '35+', icon: <Shield />, delay: 100 },
    { label: 'Security Rules', value: '150+', icon: <Assessment />, delay: 200 },
    { label: 'Log Types Supported', value: '5', icon: <Visibility />, delay: 300 },
    { label: 'Processing Speed', value: '<50ms', icon: <Speed />, delay: 400 }
  ];

  const installationMethods = [
    {
      title: 'CLI Installation',
      icon: <Terminal sx={{ fontSize: 32, color: '#8B4513' }} />,
      commands: [
        { label: 'Install via pip', command: 'pip install securon-cli', description: 'Install the Securon CLI tool' },
        { label: 'Scan Terraform', command: 'securon scan file main.tf', description: 'Scan your Terraform files' },
        { label: 'Analyze logs', command: 'securon logs analyze vpc-flow.json', description: 'Analyze AWS logs locally' }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: 'Docker Usage',
      icon: <Storage sx={{ fontSize: 32, color: '#A0522D' }} />,
      commands: [
        { label: 'Pull Docker image', command: 'docker pull securon/platform:latest', description: 'Get the latest Securon image' },
        { label: 'Run container', command: 'docker run -v $(pwd):/workspace securon/platform scan', description: 'Run security scan in container' }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: 'CI/CD Integration',
      icon: <Settings sx={{ fontSize: 32, color: '#CD853F' }} />,
      commands: [
        { label: 'GitHub Actions', command: 'uses: securon/action@v1\nwith:\n  terraform-path: ./infrastructure', description: 'Add to your GitHub workflow' },
        { label: 'GitLab CI', command: 'securon-scan:\n  script:\n    - securon scan file *.tf', description: 'Add to .gitlab-ci.yml' }
      ]
    }
  ];

  const cicdSteps = [
    { step: '1', title: 'Install', description: 'Add Securon to your CI pipeline', icon: <Download /> },
    { step: '2', title: 'Scan', description: 'Automatically scan on every commit', icon: <Scanner /> },
    { step: '3', title: 'Report', description: 'Get detailed security reports', icon: <Assessment /> },
    { step: '4', title: 'Block', description: 'Prevent insecure deployments', icon: <Shield /> }
  ];

  return (
    <Box sx={{ minHeight: '100vh', position: 'relative' }}>
      <Container maxWidth="xl" sx={{ py: 0 }}>
        {/* Art Deco Hero Section */}
        <Fade in={visible} timeout={1000}>
          <Box sx={{ 
            textAlign: 'center', 
            py: 16,
            position: 'relative',
            background: `
              radial-gradient(circle at 50% 20%, rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.15) 0%, transparent 50%),
              linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.05) 0%, transparent 100%)
            `,
            '&::before': {
              content: '""',
              position: 'absolute',
              top: 0,
              left: '50%',
              transform: 'translateX(-50%)',
              width: 200,
              height: 4,
              background: 'linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #D4AF37, transparent)',
            },
            '&::after': {
              content: '""',
              position: 'absolute',
              bottom: 0,
              left: '50%',
              transform: 'translateX(-50%)',
              width: 200,
              height: 4,
              background: 'linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #D4AF37, transparent)',
            }
          }}>
            {/* Decorative Corner Elements */}
            <Box
              sx={{
                position: 'absolute',
                top: 32,
                left: 32,
                width: 40,
                height: 40,
                borderTop: '3px solid rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.3)',
                borderLeft: '3px solid rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.3)',
              }}
            />
            <Box
              sx={{
                position: 'absolute',
                top: 32,
                right: 32,
                width: 40,
                height: 40,
                borderTop: '3px solid rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.3)',
                borderRight: '3px solid rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.3)',
              }}
            />
            <Box
              sx={{
                position: 'absolute',
                bottom: 32,
                left: 32,
                width: 40,
                height: 40,
                borderBottom: '3px solid rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.3)',
                borderLeft: '3px solid rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.3)',
              }}
            />
            <Box
              sx={{
                position: 'absolute',
                bottom: 32,
                right: 32,
                width: 40,
                height: 40,
                borderBottom: '3px solid rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.3)',
                borderRight: '3px solid rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.3)',
              }}
            />

            <Zoom in={visible} timeout={1200}>
              <Box sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
                {/* Art Deco Diamond Logo */}
                <Box
                  sx={{
                    width: 120,
                    height: 120,
                    backgroundColor: '#D4AF37',
                    transform: 'rotate(45deg)',
                    display: 'flex',
                    alignItems: 'center',
                    justifyContent: 'center',
                    mx: 'auto',
                    mb: 4,
                    position: 'relative',
                    boxShadow: '0 0 30px rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.3)',
                    '&::before': {
                      content: '""',
                      position: 'absolute',
                      top: 8,
                      left: 8,
                      right: 8,
                      bottom: 8,
                      border: '2px solid #0A0A0A',
                    }
                  }}
                >
                  <Security 
                    sx={{ 
                      fontSize: 48, 
                      color: '#0A0A0A',
                      transform: 'rotate(-45deg)',
                    }} 
                  />
                </Box>
                
                <Typography 
                  variant="h1" 
                  component="h1" 
                  gutterBottom 
                  sx={{ 
                    fontSize: { xs: '3rem', md: '4.5rem' },
                    color: '#D4AF37',
                    textShadow: '0 0 20px rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.3)',
                    mb: 2,
                  }}
                >
                  Securon Platform
                </Typography>
              </Box>
            </Zoom>
            
            <Slide direction="up" in={visible} timeout={1400}>
              <Typography 
                variant="h4" 
                sx={{ 
                  mb: 4, 
                  color: '#F2F0E4',
                  fontFamily: '"Marcellus", serif',
                  textTransform: 'uppercase',
                  letterSpacing: '0.1em',
                }}
              >
                Luxury Cloud Security
              </Typography>
            </Slide>
            
            <Slide direction="up" in={visible} timeout={1600}>
              <Typography 
                variant="h6" 
                sx={{ 
                  mb: 8, 
                  maxWidth: 800, 
                  mx: 'auto', 
                  color: '#888888',
                  lineHeight: 1.8,
                  fontSize: '1.25rem',
                }}
              >
                Sophisticated machine learning algorithms detect anomalies with theatrical precision. 
                Scan infrastructure configurations through our premium interface or integrate seamlessly into your development pipeline.
              </Typography>
            </Slide>
            
            <Slide direction="up" in={visible} timeout={1800}>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 4, justifyContent: 'center', flexWrap: 'wrap' }}>
                <Button
                  variant="contained"
                  size="large"
                  onClick={() => navigate('/logs')}
                  sx={{ 
                    px: 6, 
                    py: 2,
                    fontSize: '1.1rem',
                  }}
                >
                  Begin Analysis
                </Button>
                <Button
                  variant="outlined"
                  size="large"
                  onClick={() => document.getElementById('cli-section')?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' })}
                  sx={{ 
                    px: 6, 
                    py: 2,
                    fontSize: '1.1rem',
                  }}
                >
                  Download CLI
                </Button>
              </Box>
            </Slide>
          </Box>
        </Fade>

        {/* Art Deco Stats Section */}
        <Box sx={{ mb: 12, position: 'relative' }}>
          {/* Section Header with Decorative Lines */}
          <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mb: 8 }}>
            <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
              <Box sx={{ width: 80, height: 1, bgcolor: '#D4AF37', mr: 3 }} />
              <Typography 
                variant="h3" 
                sx={{ 
                  color: '#D4AF37',
                  textAlign: 'center',
                  position: 'relative',
                }}
              >
                Platform Metrics
              </Typography>
              <Box sx={{ width: 80, height: 1, bgcolor: '#D4AF37', ml: 3 }} />
            </Box>
            <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ color: '#888888', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: '0.2em' }}>
              Excellence in Numbers
            </Typography>
          </Box>

          <Grid container spacing={6}>
            {stats.map((stat, index) => (
              <Grid item xs={6} md={3} key={index}>
                <Zoom in={visible} timeout={1000 + stat.delay}>
                  <Card 
                    sx={{ 
                      textAlign: 'center', 
                      p: 4,
                      height: '100%',
                      position: 'relative',
                      '&::before': {
                        content: `"${['I', 'II', 'III', 'IV'][index]}"`,
                        position: 'absolute',
                        top: 16,
                        right: 16,
                        fontSize: '1.5rem',
                        fontFamily: '"Marcellus", serif',
                        color: 'rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.3)',
                      }
                    }}
                  >
                    {/* Diamond Icon Container */}
                    <Box
                      sx={{
                        width: 80,
                        height: 80,
                        transform: 'rotate(45deg)',
                        backgroundColor: '#D4AF37',
                        display: 'flex',
                        alignItems: 'center',
                        justifyContent: 'center',
                        mx: 'auto',
                        mb: 3,
                        position: 'relative',
                        '&::before': {
                          content: '""',
                          position: 'absolute',
                          top: 4,
                          left: 4,
                          right: 4,
                          bottom: 4,
                          border: '1px solid #0A0A0A',
                        }
                      }}
                    >
                      {React.cloneElement(stat.icon, {
                        sx: { 
                          fontSize: 32, 
                          color: '#0A0A0A',
                          transform: 'rotate(-45deg)',
                        }
                      })}
                    </Box>
                    
                    <Typography 
                      variant="h2" 
                      sx={{ 
                        color: '#D4AF37', 
                        fontFamily: '"Marcellus", serif',
                        mb: 1,
                        textShadow: '0 0 10px rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.2)',
                      }}
                    >
                      {stat.value}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography 
                      variant="body1" 
                      sx={{ 
                        color: '#F2F0E4',
                        textTransform: 'uppercase',
                        letterSpacing: '0.1em',
                        fontWeight: 500,
                      }}
                    >
                      {stat.label}
                    </Typography>
                  </Card>
                </Zoom>
              </Grid>
            ))}
          </Grid>
        </Box>

        {/* CLI Installation Section */}
        <Box id="cli-section" sx={{ mb: 8 }}>
          <Fade in={visible} timeout={2000}>
            <Typography variant="h3" component="h2" textAlign="center" gutterBottom sx={{ mb: 6, color: '#8B4513', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
               Get Started Locally
            </Typography>
          </Fade>
          
          <Grid container spacing={4}>
            {installationMethods.map((method, index) => (
              <Grid item xs={12} md={4} key={index}>
                <Slide direction="up" in={visible} timeout={2200 + index * 200}>
                  <Card 
                    elevation={6} 
                    sx={{ 
                      height: '100%',
                      bgcolor: 'white',
                      border: '1px solid #DEB887',
                      transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
                      '&:hover': { 
                        transform: 'translateY(-4px)',
                        boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(139, 69, 19, 0.15)'
                      }
                    }}
                  >
                    <CardContent sx={{ p: 3 }}>
                      <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 3 }}>
                        {method.icon}
                        <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ ml: 2, color: '#8B4513', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                          {method.title}
                        </Typography>
                      </Box>
                      
                      <List dense>
                        {method.commands.map((cmd, idx) => (
                          <ListItem key={idx} sx={{ px: 0, py: 1 }}>
                            <Box sx={{ width: '100%' }}>
                              <Typography variant="subtitle2" sx={{ color: '#A0522D', fontWeight: 'bold', mb: 1 }}>
                                {cmd.label}
                              </Typography>
                              <Paper 
                                sx={{ 
                                  p: 2, 
                                  bgcolor: '#2D2D2D', 
                                  color: '#00FF00',
                                  fontFamily: 'monospace',
                                  fontSize: '0.85rem',
                                  position: 'relative',
                                  '&:hover': { bgcolor: '#3D3D3D' },
                                  transition: 'all 0.2s ease'
                                }}
                              >
                                <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'flex-start' }}>
                                  <Typography component="pre" sx={{ color: '#00FF00', fontFamily: 'monospace', fontSize: 'inherit', margin: 0, whiteSpace: 'pre-wrap' }}>
                                    {cmd.command}
                                  </Typography>
                                  <Tooltip title={copiedCommand === cmd.command ? 'Copied!' : 'Copy command'}>
                                    <IconButton
                                      size="small"
                                      onClick={() => copyToClipboard(cmd.command, cmd.command)}
                                      sx={{ color: copiedCommand === cmd.command ? '#4CAF50' : '#00FF00', ml: 1 }}
                                    >
                                      <ContentCopy fontSize="small" />
                                    </IconButton>
                                  </Tooltip>
                                </Box>
                              </Paper>
                              <Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mt: 1, display: 'block' }}>
                                {cmd.description}
                              </Typography>
                            </Box>
                          </ListItem>
                        ))}
                      </List>
                    </CardContent>
                  </Card>
                </Slide>
              </Grid>
            ))}
          </Grid>
        </Box>

        {/* CI/CD Integration Steps */}
        <Fade in={visible} timeout={2800}>
          <Paper 
            elevation={6} 
            sx={{ 
              p: 6, 
              mb: 8, 
              background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #F5DEB3 0%, #DEB887 100%)',
              borderRadius: 3
            }}
          >
            <Typography variant="h3" component="h2" textAlign="center" gutterBottom sx={{ mb: 6, color: '#8B4513', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
               CI/CD Pipeline Integration
            </Typography>
            
            <Grid container spacing={4}>
              {cicdSteps.map((step, index) => (
                <Grid item xs={12} md={3} key={index}>
                  <Zoom in={visible} timeout={3000 + index * 200}>
                    <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center' }}>
                      <Avatar 
                        sx={{ 
                          bgcolor: '#8B4513', 
                          mx: 'auto', 
                          mb: 2, 
                          width: 80, 
                          height: 80,
                          fontSize: '2rem',
                          fontWeight: 'bold'
                        }}
                      >
                        {step.step}
                      </Avatar>
                      <Box sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                        {React.cloneElement(step.icon, { sx: { fontSize: 40, color: '#A0522D' } })}
                      </Box>
                      <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom sx={{ color: '#8B4513' }}>
                        {step.title}
                      </Typography>
                      <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                        {step.description}
                      </Typography>
                    </Box>
                  </Zoom>
                </Grid>
              ))}
            </Grid>
            
            <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mt: 4 }}>
              <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ mb: 2, color: '#8B4513' }}>
                Integrate with your favorite CI/CD platform
              </Typography>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2, justifyContent: 'center', flexWrap: 'wrap' }}>
                <Chip icon={<GitHub />} label="GitHub Actions" variant="outlined" sx={{ borderColor: '#8B4513', color: '#8B4513' }} />
                <Chip icon={<Code />} label="GitLab CI" variant="outlined" sx={{ borderColor: '#8B4513', color: '#8B4513' }} />
                <Chip icon={<Build />} label="Jenkins" variant="outlined" sx={{ borderColor: '#8B4513', color: '#8B4513' }} />
                <Chip icon={<CloudDownload />} label="Azure DevOps" variant="outlined" sx={{ borderColor: '#8B4513', color: '#8B4513' }} />
              </Box>
            </Box>
          </Paper>
        </Fade>

        {/* Core Features */}
        <Box sx={{ mb: 8 }}>
          <Fade in={visible} timeout={3400}>
            <Typography variant="h3" component="h2" textAlign="center" gutterBottom sx={{ mb: 6, color: '#8B4513', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
               Powerful Security Features
            </Typography>
          </Fade>
          
          <Grid container spacing={4}>
            {features.map((feature, index) => (
              <Grid item xs={12} md={4} key={index}>
                <Slide direction="up" in={visible} timeout={3600 + feature.delay}>
                  <Card 
                    elevation={6} 
                    sx={{ 
                      height: '100%', 
                      display: 'flex', 
                      flexDirection: 'column',
                      bgcolor: 'white',
                      border: '1px solid #DEB887',
                      transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
                      '&:hover': { 
                        transform: 'translateY(-8px)',
                        boxShadow: '0 12px 32px rgba(139, 69, 19, 0.2)'
                      }
                    }}
                  >
                    <CardContent sx={{ flexGrow: 1, textAlign: 'center', p: 4 }}>
                      <Box sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
                        {feature.icon}
                      </Box>
                      
                      <Typography variant="h5" component="h3" gutterBottom fontWeight="bold" sx={{ color: '#8B4513' }}>
                        {feature.title}
                      </Typography>
                      
                      <Typography variant="body1" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mb: 3, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
                        {feature.description}
                      </Typography>
                      
                      <Box sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
                        {feature.highlights.map((highlight, idx) => (
                          <Chip 
                            key={idx}
                            label={highlight} 
                            size="small" 
                            variant="outlined" 
                            sx={{ 
                              m: 0.5, 
                              borderColor: '#CD853F', 
                              color: '#8B4513',
                              '&:hover': { bgcolor: '#F5DEB3' }
                            }}
                          />
                        ))}
                      </Box>
                      
                      <Button
                        variant="contained"
                        fullWidth
                        endIcon={<ArrowForward />}
                        onClick={feature.action}
                        sx={{ 
                          mt: 'auto',
                          bgcolor: '#8B4513',
                          '&:hover': { 
                            bgcolor: '#A0522D',
                            transform: 'translateY(-2px)'
                          },
                          transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
                          py: 1.5
                        }}
                      >
                        {feature.actionText}
                      </Button>
                    </CardContent>
                  </Card>
                </Slide>
              </Grid>
            ))}
          </Grid>
        </Box>

        {/* Call to Action */}
        <Fade in={visible} timeout={4200}>
          <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', py: 6, mb: 4 }}>
            <Typography variant="h3" gutterBottom sx={{ color: '#8B4513', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
              Ready to Secure Your Cloud Infrastructure?
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="h6" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mb: 4, maxWidth: 800, mx: 'auto' }}>
              Start analyzing your logs and scanning your infrastructure in seconds. Use our web interface, CLI tool, or integrate directly into your CI/CD pipeline.
            </Typography>
            
            <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 3, justifyContent: 'center', flexWrap: 'wrap' }}>
              <Button
                variant="contained"
                size="large"
                startIcon={<CloudUpload />}
                onClick={() => navigate('/logs')}
                sx={{ 
                  bgcolor: '#8B4513',
                  '&:hover': { 
                    bgcolor: '#A0522D',
                    transform: 'translateY(-2px)'
                  },
                  transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
                  px: 4, py: 1.5
                }}
              >
                Upload & Analyze Logs
              </Button>
              <Button
                variant="outlined"
                size="large"
                startIcon={<Scanner />}
                onClick={() => navigate('/scanner')}
                sx={{ 
                  borderColor: '#8B4513',
                  color: '#8B4513',
                  '&:hover': { 
                    borderColor: '#A0522D',
                    bgcolor: '#F5DEB3',
                    transform: 'translateY(-2px)'
                  },
                  transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
                  px: 4, py: 1.5
                }}
              >
                Scan Terraform Code
              </Button>
              <Button
                variant="outlined"
                size="large"
                startIcon={<Download />}
                onClick={() => document.getElementById('cli-section')?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' })}
                sx={{ 
                  borderColor: '#8B4513',
                  color: '#8B4513',
                  '&:hover': { 
                    borderColor: '#A0522D',
                    bgcolor: '#F5DEB3',
                    transform: 'translateY(-2px)'
                  },
                  transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
                  px: 4, py: 1.5
                }}
              >
                Download CLI
              </Button>
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </Fade>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Dashboard;
